title: FSSAI
cleaned_text: all amendments to the individual regulations notified in the Gazette of India for the purpose of providing ready reference to food business operators and consumers; and can't be considered a legal document. Each amendment in compendium is marked with the amendment number and the same are listed at the end of document. In case of any errors/overlapping in compendium, the original notifications/amendments would prevail for the same. I. Food Safety and Standards Regulations 1.
